    eu.digitisation.math  

    • Uses of Counter in eu.digitisation.math

      Subclasses of Counter in eu.digitisation.math 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BiCounter<T1 extends Comparable<T1>,T2 extends Comparable<T2>>
      Keeps a counter for pairs of objects (joint frequencies) and marginal counts
      Methods in eu.digitisation.math that return Counter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Counter<Type> Counter.add(Counter<Type> counter)
      Increment the count for an object with the value stored in another counter.

      Increment the count for an object with the given value
      Counter<Type> Counter.dec(Type object)
      Subtract one to the count for an object
